  • Method Details

    • replace

      public static String replace(String str, Object... objects)
      Replace "Some {text} data" with substring. Example: str = "{host}:{port}/{app}" with parameters "localhost", 8080 and "school" will be returned "localhost:8080/school".
      Parameters:
      str - Source string in a form like "http://{host}:{port}/{app}".
      objects - Substrings like "myhost", 7654, "mycoolapp".
      Returns:
      Resulting string in a form like "http://myhost:7654/mycoolapp".

    • removeAdjacentSpaces

      public static String removeAdjacentSpaces(String rawSource)
      Remove adjacent spaces.
      Parameters:
      rawSource - Source string.
      Returns:
      Trimmed string.

    • normalizeDateTime

      public static String normalizeDateTime(String input, String delimiter, String pattern)
      Try nomalize date OR time string representation.
      Parameters:
      input - Normalizing string.
      delimiter - Delimiter.
      pattern - Valid datetime pattern.
      Returns:
      Valid or not.
